content: this gorgeous floret stitch washcloth is my april contribution to the 2024 washcloth cal it is super quick and easy to make and has a wonderful texture > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** approximately 44-175 yds of category 4 medium weight cotton yarn i used knit picks dishie yarn in the bumblebee colorway size i 5 5mm furls polaris streamline galaxy crochet hook yarn needle for weaving ends scissors
